sentences.en: 30% of customers expressed dissatisfaction with the service.
A recent open meeting of College members revealed widespread dissatisfaction.
sentences.cn: 最近的一次学会成员公开会上，大家普遍流露出不满情绪。

sentences.en: Dissatisfaction often leads to outright treason.
sentences.cn: 政治上的不满常常导致断然的背叛.

sentences.en: He hinted his dissatisfaction with her work.
sentences.cn: 他暗示了对她工作的不满.

sentences.en: Letters from viewers express their dissatisfaction with current programmes.
sentences.cn: 电视观众来信表示对当前节目不满.

sentences.en: Low pay is the main cause of job dissatisfaction among teachers.
sentences.cn: 低薪是教师对工作不满的主要原因。

sentences.en: Many people have expressed their dissatisfaction with the arrangement.
sentences.cn: 许多人表示对这一安排不满。

sentences.en: Many people have expressed their dissatisfaction with the proposals.
sentences.cn: 很多人已表示出对此建议的不满.

sentences.en: MPs voice public dissatisfaction at having to pay higher taxes.
sentences.cn: 下议院议员道出了公众对增加税收的不满.

sentences.en: Now he felt an intense dissatisfaction.
sentences.cn: 此刻他心里大有一种强烈的未足之感.

sentences.en: She expressed her dissatisfaction with him.
She has already expressed her dissatisfaction with this aspect of the policy.
sentences.cn: 她已对政策的这方面表示了不满。

sentences.en: The fact of dissatisfaction is undeniable.
sentences.cn: 事实虽令人不满,但却无可争辩.

sentences.en: The individual citizen, unfortunately, cannot effectively register his dissatisfaction with this practice.
sentences.cn: 不幸, 单个的公民不能有效地提出他对于这个办法的不满.
那个工人咕哝地抱怨着他的不满.

sentences.en: There is a widespread dissatisfaction among the students with the food on campus.
sentences.cn: 学生们普遍对学校的饭菜不太满意.

sentences.en: To everyone's surprise, workers expressed great dissatisfaction with the new program.
sentences.cn: 使人惊奇的是, 工人们对这种新的安排表示极大的不满.

words.tran_cn: 不满意的；不高兴的；流露不满的
使不满（dissatisfy的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 不满，不平，令人不满的事物
trans.tran_en: a feeling of not being satisfied
